scripts.text:
WITH share_ids AS (
  SELECT
    share_id
  FROM fss1.ch_share_account_1
),
transactions_daily AS (
  SELECT
    ct.share_id,
    ct.transaction_date::date AS stat_date,
    ct.transaction_type_code_id,
    SUM(ct.transaction_amount) AS total_amount
  FROM fss1.ch_transaction_1 ct
  JOIN share_ids csa ON ct.share_id = csa.share_id
  WHERE ct.transaction_type_code_id IN (1, 2, 3)
  GROUP BY ct.share_id, stat_date, ct.transaction_type_code_id
)
INSERT INTO fss1.share_group_financial_stat (
  share_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT
  share_id,
  transaction_type_code_id AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
  stat_date AS date,
  total_amount AS value
FROM transactions_daily;
